SENT.plain: Behçet's disease is a multisystem inflammatory vasculitic disorder with a chronic course for which the etiology is unknown
The central nervous system can be affected in 5% to 30% of all Behçet patients, yet it has been rarely reported in children or in Western countries
We describe a 14-year-old girl with Behçet's disease that presented initially as a cerebral infarct without venous sinus thrombosis
